import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { //dropdownOpen = false; activeDropdown: string | null = null; // toggleDropdown() { // this.dropdownOpen = !this.dropdownOpen; // } toggleDropdown(dropdown: string): void { this.activeDropdown = this.activeDropdown === dropdown ? null : dropdown; } }

CATERPILLARS TECH

group Employee arrow_drop_down

  • card_giftcard Add Employee Benefits

  • edit Correction Requests
